Blog.post: This is a very cool state! I love it. my grandma andgrandpa live her......and my aunt and cousin too. i come down here every summerto visit them. it is always a lot offun. but now i miss katie a lot and i never have a chance to go online to talk to her. it sucks. i miss her a lot. Katie icant go online because we are always doing stuff and it is always to latew by the time we get done...so its not that i dont wana talk to u its just that i cant :(.......soo yea and hello to all my other friends who live in florida! hope to c u all soon!! -jake

OHHH I MISS U SOOO MUCH!! I know i have not been online because i couldnot go on. my grandpa is always doingwork and we are alwys busy. i know it sucksa lot. i am having a lot of fun though. i might get a I pod...i hope 4 my b-day. yea...so ill try to get online when i can but in the mean time ill be thinkin a whole lot about u! and I LOVE YOU!! u know that.lol BYE BYE 4 NOW KATIE........ I LoVE U -jake

Yesturday was my 13th birth day.YA! we went to c i,robot at 3:00 came back went swimming and played 1 of the best games in the world Halo for Xbox. I robot was a very cool/funny movie. Ecpesially the part when he was talkin to this guy and all of a sudden he went cough cough.....sry i am alergic to BullShit.Lol it cracked me up.I really liked it and i hope ever1 else did.I loved gettin all my gifts and the very funny i-o-u from katie.(lol).I had a godd b-day,and i hope every1 else had fun. well... ill try n update my posts after i get back from vacatinon. bye Jake-

Today is the day where i get to c my friends for the last tim before i go away.I am leaving tommarow at 6:00a.m. I am really goin to miss every1 especially katie ross. she is the love of my life!In a way it will be good because i get to c all of my relatives and family up in new york and new jersy. I will be away for about 2 weeks., and am goin to be away from home on my birthday on august 5th. wel...i hope to c every 1 soon.bye bye 4 now. jake-

Eva heard about this crapy ass schoold...Well this is where i go and most of my friends. This school is the worst.It looks like it is run down and most of all the teachers Suk.I am in the 8th grade thank god.I have to take 1 more year of this school! This is a very very discombobulated school.lol.. I especially hate Mr.Patsas(the Band Teacher) and The administration.But now 8th grde will be a drag cuz katie wont be there any more :( she is goin to 9th grade.very bad lol. But most of all this is a school that know1 likes.
